doc.field: HARCOURT HBJ> SELLS SHARES TO ESOP

Harcourt Brace Jovanovich Inc said it sold 4,805,432 shares of its common at 10.25 dlrs a share to an employee stock ownership plan as part of its previously announced recapitalization plan. Harcourt said the shares sold are not entitled to a special dividend previously declared under the plan. It said the shares will be entitled to vote at a special meeting of shareholders scheduled for July 23. Reuter
